scripts.replit: npm run web-build && npm run serve
scripts.todo:api: grep -r 'API-INTEGRATION' src/ docs/ || echo 'No API integrations found'
scripts.todo:priority: grep -r 'Priority 1' src/ docs/ || echo 'No Priority 1 items found'
scripts.todo:auth: grep -r 'API-INTEGRATION: Auth' src/ || echo 'No Auth integrations found'
scripts.todo:offers: grep -r 'API-INTEGRATION: Offers' src/ || echo 'No Offers integrations found'
scripts.todo:ai: grep -r 'API-INTEGRATION: AI' src/ || echo 'No AI integrations found'
scripts.todo:push: grep -r 'API-INTEGRATION: Push' src/ || echo 'No Push integrations found'
scripts.todo:poolbrain: grep -r 'API-INTEGRATION: Poolbrain' src/ || echo 'No Poolbrain integrations found'
scripts.todo:ui: grep -r 'UI-FIX' src/ docs/ || echo 'No UI fixes found'
scripts.todo:all:
npm run todo:api && echo '
=== Priority 1 Items ===' && npm run todo:priority && echo '
=== UI Fixes ===' && npm run todo:ui
